DOC.HEADLINE: UNITED FARM_WORKERS ORGANIZERS LIST GAINS
DOC.TEXT: The United Farm_Workers has signed 10 # 000 new members this year and won seven union representation elections , organizers said at the union ' s 12th national convention , the first since the death of founder Cesar Chavez . " ( There is ) a lot of enthusiasm , a lot of commitment to carry_on Cesar ' s work , " union President Arturo Rodriguez said of the 500 delegates who attended the convention Saturday and Sunday . Federal housing chief Henry G . Cisneros told the delegates that federal funding will help build new housing for farm_workers .
